name: Do Date: Due Date
description:
"The Due Date is my Do Date." - Anonymous

You are a high school student trying to finish a week's worth of tasks after deciding that your do date is on the due date. 

You need to complete tasks that increase every week. Subjects include Mathematics, English, History, Chemistry, and Biology. You have 1 minute to submit any homework given. The school requires that you get a perfect score before you can move on to another week. 

__________________________________________________________________________

HOW TO PLAY

-> Open To-do list
-> Remember the tasks
-> Open the tasks  of the respective subjects
-> Read the teacher's instructions (IMPORTANT)
-> The periodic table tab and species identifier tab are open if you need them in Chemistry or Biology
-> Try to submit before the deadline
-> A Goggle Letter tab will open after you complete your tasks
-> (TIP) You can go memorize the periodic table and/or the species before opening Goggle Letter
-> Open the tab to see if you can continue the next week
-> Rinse and Repeat, You gotta do what you gotta do

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
with a theme of
"Let There Be Chaos"

The game  was made 16:10 and thus, it doesn't fit on 16:9 monitors. Sorry about this. I will update it after the jam rating period ends.
